### Normal section

```{r}
head(mtcars) %>%
  regulartable() %>%
  color(part = "header", color = "red") %>%
  bold(part = "header", bold = TRUE) %>%
  color(i = ~ mpg < 21, color = "orange") %>%
  set_header_labels(mpg = "Miles per gallon") %>%
  autofit()
```
